parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause the vehicle to become uncontrollable, leading to accidents or loss of control, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: especially at high speeds or in inclement weather.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty glow plug can cause engine failure, leading to a loss of power, stalling, and potentially resulting in accidents or fires.
A malfunctioning EGT exhaust sensor can cause the engine to stall, leading to a loss of power and potentially resulting in accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Failure due to Lifter and Valve Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine lifters and valves can cause catastrophic engine damage, leading to expensive repairs and potentially leaving the driver stranded. This can also lead to a loss of power and control, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The check engine light is illuminated
the exhaust temperature sensor is faulty
the engine makes loud knocking or tapping noises
the engine oil pressure is low
the vehicle is experiencing a loss of power or performance.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty exhaust temperature sensor can cause the check engine light to illuminate, leading to unnecessary repairs and potentially masking more serious underlying issues. This can also lead to decreased engine performance and fuel efficiency.
symptoms: The check engine light is illuminated
the engine is running rich or lean
the engine is experiencing decreased performance or power
the vehicle is experiencing poor fuel economy.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear wheel hub assembly can cause the wheel to detach from the vehicle, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential fires, which can result in serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The rear wheel comes off while driving
the vehicle drags to a stop
the rear wheel hub assembly fails

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the trailer lighting system can cause a lack of visibility, increasing the risk of accidents, especially when towing a trailer at night or in low-light conditions.
symptoms: and four-way/emergency lights do not function when towing a trailer
despite all lights working properly on the truck itself.
